description: Roof framing detail sheet with details covering rafter-to-wall connections, ridge connections, beam splices, hurricane ties, MSTA24 straps, shear clip connections, bracing specifications, and column cap details. Bottom row (Details 12-9) is empty. Multiple details reference shearwall schedule for shear clip requirements.
